paper_abstract: The first (M-1) and the second (M-2) Zagreb indices, as well as the first ((M) over bar (1)) and the second ((M) over bar (2)) Zagreb coindices, and the relations between them are examined. An upper bound on M-1(T) and a lower bound on 2M(2)(T) + 1/2M(1)(T) of trees is obtained, in terms of the number of vertices (n) and maximum degree (Delta). Moreover, we compare the Zagreb indices and the Zagreb coindices of trees.
paper_title: Comparing Zagreb Indices and Coindices of Trees
